snippet: In the future, the TV shows and movies you want to watch should find you - you shouldn't have to find them. And you should be able to watch them on any device. That's the video service Cisco Systems wants to put in your living room.
abstract: In the future, the TV shows and movies you want to watch should find you - you shouldn't have to find them. And you should be able to watch them on any device. That's the video service Cisco Systems wants to put in your living room.

headline.main: C.E.S 2013: Cisco Wants Your Video to Find You
